item.title: Lets Grep
item.description: We’ve all had to look for text in files. The “manual” way to do that is open the text files, one at a time, in some code editor and do a cmd-f or ctrl-f and search for the text. Then, once you’ve found the text, you make a note of it. And you repeat this process for each and every file. Imagine the time and manual effort this would take for hundreds of files.
